thread.title: Tory MP Heidi Allen wants tax credit rethink
thread.title_full: Tory MP Heidi Allen wants tax credit rethink - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Tory MP Heidi Allen wants tax credit rethink
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Tory MP Heidi Allen wants tax credit rethink 20 October 2015 Last updated at 20:05 BST
Conservative MP Heidi Allen has called on her party to rethink their position on cuts to tax credits.
She suggested ministers were losing sight of the difficulties of working people in their "single-minded determination to achieve a surplus".
In her maiden speech in the Commons during a Labour debate on tax credits, Ms Allen, the MP for South Cambridgeshire, said she supported the principle of reducing reliance on the state but feared the way the government was going about it was all wrong.
Read more MP Heidi Allen warns tax credit cuts 'betray' Tory values
